description.narrative: - Employees - A significant number of direct and indirect jobs will be created once all shopping malls of ECRED are completed. - Customers: company supports the growth of local retail brands that has a positive impact on the economy - Women Employment: modern malls provide opportunities for women to enter the workforce by providing a safe and structured environment. - Integration: Malls in secondary cities and new areas will provide more economic opportunities to the local population.

The proposed investment consists of a US$135 million in A Loan, of which $45 million is to finance the retail property business of Egyptian Center for Real Estate Development, SAE, Egypt (ECRED or the Company) owned by AlHokair Family (Sponsors). In addition, the investment will also consist of a US$90 million loan to Saudi FAS Holding Company, KSA (Saudi FAS) to refinance its existing capital contribution in ECRED for existing operations in Egypt. Saudi FAS is also fully owned by the Sponsors. The financing will support ECREDs business expansion by partly funding retail and commercial projects in newly developed areas of Cairo and secondary cities in Egypt.

participating-org.narrative: EGYPTIAN CENTRES FOR REAL ESTATE DEVELOPMENT SAE
